sqlMap.insert: insert into notice (notice_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_expiredate, notice_active) values (notice_no_seq.nextval, #title#, #content#, #expiredate#, #active#)
sqlMap.select: select notice_no as no, notice_title as title, notice_content as content, notice_regdate as regdate, notice_expiredate as expiredate, notice_active as active from notice order by notice_no desc
select notice_no as no, notice_title as title, notice_content as content, notice_regdate as regdate, notice_expiredate as expiredate, notice_active as active from notice where notice_no = #value#
